episodes.title: Daburisu no kemono tachi
episodes.plot: Al is abducted by chimeras led by the seemingly indestructible Homunculus known as Greed. When Ed's rescue attempt falls short, Izumi proves once more that she's got the brothers' best interests in mind.

episodes.title: Hakuchuu no yume
episodes.plot: The ruse of Winry's abduction by Scar is revealed, but a plan of rescue must still be hatched. A brutal storm is coming - one which only Alphonse Elric can brave.

episodes.title: Homunkurusu
episodes.plot: Long ago, the blood of a simple slave was used in an experiment which created a strange, shapeless being. In exchange for the gift of existence, the being gave the slave a name - and cursed him with immortality.

episodes.title: Naraku
episodes.plot: Bound by more than blood, the Elrics have long shared joy and pain. Now, with Al wandering the frigid void - and Ed losing blood by Kimblee's hand - the mystical connection of their souls could prove fatal.

episodes.title: Hangeki no kizashi
episodes.plot: May and Marcoh's efforts to decode the research of Scar's brother yield progress, but it might be too late to prevent catastrophe. Violence is spreading across the land, and it will soon reach the northern border.

episodes.title: Ari no hitokami
episodes.plot: In the snowy north, the soldiers of Fort Briggs engage an invading army and Marcoh leads an attack against monstrous Envy. In Central, an ominous and shocking secret is revealed to Olivier Armstrong.

episodes.title: Barin barin no zenkai
episodes.plot: Hohenheim and Alphonse enjoy a chance to get reacquainted. Their bond is restored with ease, inspiring the father to share his secrets with his sons - but one of them is far away and on the run.

episodes.title: Yaskusoku no hi
episodes.plot: The Promised Day is approaching. While most will face the coming chaos with their own kind, Edward forms a new group comprised of human, chimera and Homunculus

episodes.title: Semaru kage
episodes.plot: Those who have prepared to reclaim a nation find their plans exposed. The chaos multiplies after an assassin strikes down a mighty leader in broad daylight, and Alphonse falls prey to monsters in the dark.

episodes.title: Yami no shisha
episodes.plot: A sinister voice rings out from the shell of Al's armor, and Ed and Greed find themselves under attack. As the Homunculi use the darkness to their advantage, a face from the past arrives to join the battle.

episodes.title: Chikadou no chikai
episodes.plot: After investigating the twisted roots of the Bradley family tree, Mustang gathers his most loyal troops. Meanwhile, Ed and his allies continue fighting Selim, who shocks everyone by turning on his own kind.

episodes.title: Oyako no jou
episodes.plot: With his father's help, Al takes incredible steps to contain the monstrous Pride. As the sun begins to rise on the Promised Day, the youngest Elric listens while the Homunculus ponders his very human mother.

episodes.title: Sentoraru douran
episodes.plot: Mustang leads a ragtag assault force of hardy northern troops - and welcome faces from the past - against Central's defenses. Victory seems certain until the military's most horrifying secret is revealed.

episodes.title: Fushi no gundan
episodes.plot: Ed's crew faces a horde of ravenous mannequins, abominations powered by human souls. The twisted creatures aren't the only unstoppable force on the battlefield - Pride, Sloth, and Envy are on the move.

episodes.title: Minna no chikara
episodes.plot: With the philosopher stone in his possession, Alphonse fearlessly takes on Pride and Kimblee. Elsewhere, the Armstrongs find themselves trapped between Sloth's onslaught and the guns of Central's troops.

episodes.title: Fukushuu no honoo
episodes.plot: After a startling radio broadcast grants Mustang's forces the advantage over Central's troops, the Flame Alchemist unleashes the brutal power of burning hatred in the battle against the killer of Maes Hughes.

episodes.title: Rekka no saki ni
episodes.plot: As Envy writhes within the firestorm unleashed by Mustang's vengeful rage, Hawkeye must take drastic measures to prevent the Flame Alchemist's hatred from going out of control.

episodes.title: Otonatachi no ikizama
episodes.plot: A rebel victory is imminent and hope takes hold among Mustang and Armstrong's troops. Central's forces teeter on the brink of collapse - until their fallen leader returns to take control.

episodes.title: Daisoutou no kikan
episodes.plot: Central's forces fight with renewed vigor following Bradley's return, and the Führer himself enters the battle. His first opponent is an armored tank. His second foe is even tougher.

episodes.title: Eien no itoma
episodes.plot: The battle for a nation's soul descends into chaos. Bradley unleashes death on those who dare engage him. Beneath Central, the one responsible for the Führer's creation unleashes something far, far worse.

episodes.title: Hitobashira
episodes.plot: Mustang must make a difficult choice: will he break alchemy's greatest taboo? Or will he watch the person dearest to him die? Meanwhile, it grows ever more difficult to discern where Ling ends and Greed begins.

episodes.title: Ushinawareta hikari
episodes.plot: As the light of the sun vanishes, Mustang learns the loss which comes from seeing the other side of the Gateway - and five sacrifices gather in the dark presence of the Father.

episodes.title: Ten no hitomi, shi no tobira
episodes.plot: The light is gone. Shadows swallow everything. As the planet quakes and the heavens tremble, the souls of heroes and villains alike vanish into darkness. The circle is complete.

episodes.title: Kami o nomikomishi mono
episodes.plot: Millions of lifeless bodies litter the landscape of Amestris, and a being with the power to create suns is unleashed upon the world. Unless Hohenheim has something amazing up his sleeve, all is surely lost.

episodes.title: Seizetsunaru hangeki
episodes.plot: A truly epic battle erupts when Edward, Mustang, Hawkeye, Greed, Izumi, and Armstrong attack the god-like Father. The odds are against the forces of good - until one brave boy makes a shocking sacrifice.

episodes.title: Tobira no mukougawa
episodes.plot: Ed fights the original homunculus known as 'The father' trying to defeat him in order to get his and Al's body back.

episodes.title: Tabiji no hate
episodes.plot: Ed and Al start a new adventure in searching for new and innovative ways of alchemy.

episodes.title: Sensei Monogatari
episodes.plot: Izumi's alchemy training and her first love.

episodes.title: Sore mo mata Kare no Senjou
episodes.plot: While in military academy, Mustang and Hughes become friends.
